name: eslint
description: ESLint is an open-source JavaScript linting utility. Linting is a process that runs a program that will analyze code for potential errors. ESLint helps developers find and fix problems in their JavaScript code without executing it. It checks for common syntax and stylistic errors, such as missing semicolons, unused variables, inconsistent indentation, etc. ESLint is highly configurable, allowing developers to specify their own linting rules. It also includes a pluggable architecture for extending its capabilities. This means you can use plugins to create and manage your own rules to enforce specific coding standards and conventions. ESLint supports both ECMAScript 2015 (ES6) and JSX syntax out of the box, making it a popular choice for developers working with modern JavaScript frameworks like React and Vue.js.

name: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is an open-source programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft. It's a strict syntactical superset of JavaScript, which means any existing JavaScript programs are also valid TypeScript programs.

name: StyleX
description: StyleX is a simple, easy-to-use JavaScript syntax and compiler for styling web apps. StyleX combines the strengths and avoids the weaknesses of both inline styles and static CSS. Defining and using styles requires only local knowledge within a component, and avoids specificity issues while retaining features like Media Queries. StyleX builds optimized styles using collision-free atomic CSS which is superior to what could be authored and maintained by hand.

name: SPA
description: A Single Page Application (SPA) is a type of web application that loads a single HTML page and dynamically updates that page as the user interacts with the app. SPAs work inside a browser and require no page reloading during use, which tends to result in a more fluid, user-friendly experience.

name: Full Stack Application
description: A full-stack application is a software application that encompasses both frontend and backend in a single code base.

name: CSS Preprocessors
description: CSS preprocessors are scripting languages that extend the default capabilities of CSS, like scss and less

name: TanStack Query
description: Powerful asynchronous state management for TS/JS, React, Solid, Vue, Svelte and Angular

name: TanStack Table
description: Headless component for building fast and extendable tables and data-grids for React, VueJS & Angular

name: Pinia (Vue3)
description: The officially recommended state management library for Vue 3.

name: Testing Library
description: Simple and complete testing utilities that encourage good testing practices.

name: NGRX (Angular)
description: NgRx Store provides reactive state management for Angular apps inspired by Redux. Unify the events in your application and derive state using RxJS.

name: shadcn/ui (React)
description: A set of minimalistic and modular UI components.

name: Prisma
description: Next-generation ORM for Node.js and TypeScript.

name: Storybook
description: A frontend workshop for building UI components and pages in isolation. It streamlines UI development, testing, and documentation.

name: NextUI
description: Modern and beautiful UI library for React that supports dark mode natively.

name: PandaCss
description: A minimalist CSS framework for building responsive and modern websites and applications.

name: GraphQL
description: A data query and manipulation language for APIs, and a runtime for fulfilling those queries with your existing data.

name: Radix
description: An open-source UI component library for building high-quality, accessible design systems and web apps.

name: PrimeNG
description: A rich set of open-source UI Components for Angular.

name: PrimeVue
description: A rich set of open-source UI Components for Vue.

name: Quasar
description: High-performance, Material Design 2, full-front-end stack for Vue.js

name: PrimeReact
description: A rich set of open-source UI Components for React.

name: MomentJS
description: Parse, validate, manipulate, and display dates and times in JavaScript.

name: Axios
description: A promise-based HTTP client for the browser and Node.js.

name: JQuery
description: A fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, and animation much simpler with an easy-to-use API that works across a multitude of browsers.

name: Vuex
description: State management pattern + library for Vue.js applications.

name: Enzyme
description: JavaScript Testing utility for React that makes it easier to test your React Components' output.
